categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The sulfaro plant was a plant native to Kirdo III. It was the chooba's favorite dish. The plant had a very meaty interior. Kitonaks often mimicked sulfaro plants. They would lie down and wait for a chooba to climb up to its head, looking for the plant's interior. The Kitonak would then swallow the chooba whole.
